FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our shampoo marketplace
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the shampoo marketplace work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our marketplace connects shampoo buyers with sellers from around the world. Browse, compare, and purchase a wide variety of shampoos all in one place.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What types of shampoos are available?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We offer a diverse range of shampoos including organic, sulfate-free, color-safe, medicated, and specialty formulas for all hair types and concerns.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How do I know if a shampoo is right for my hair?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Each product listing includes detailed information about hair type suitability, ingredients, and customer reviews to help you make an informed decision.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: What is the return policy for shampoos?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We offer a 30-day return policy for unopened products. If you're unsatisfied with your purchase, please contact our customer service team for assistance.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Are the shampoos on your marketplace cruelty-free?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Many of our shampoos are cruelty-free, and we clearly label these products. You can use our search filters to find cruelty-free options easily.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Shampoo Marketplace
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the shampoo marketplace work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our marketplace connects shampoo buyers with a wide range of sellers. Browse products, compare prices, read reviews, and purchase your favorite shampoos all in one place.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What types of shampoos are available?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We offer a diverse selection of shampoos including natural, organic, medicated, color-safe, volumizing, and specialty formulas for all hair types and concerns.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How do I know if a shampoo is right for my hair?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Each product listing includes detailed information about hair type suitability, ingredients, and customer reviews. You can also use our hair type quiz to get personalized recommendations.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What if I'm not satisfied with my purchase?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with your shampoo, you can return it for a full refund or exchange it for a different product.
